title: Plate
description: faience soup plate of lobed octagonal shape; rim edged with green-brown glaze; chinoiserie scene in center; edge of plate is completed with the application of small sprays of flowers of the indianische blumen type; reverse shows double set of stilt marks, typical of petit feu wares
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in memory of her father, Mr. Thomas Shevlin
